articles.title: There's no life in the clouds of Venus, study says. Jupiter might be different - CBC.ca
articles.description: A new study is throwing cold water on the possibility of life in the clouds of Venus. Scientists from Europe and the U.S. reported Monday there isn't nearly enough water vapor in the scorching planet's clouds to support life as we know it.
articles.content:

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Mask-free and 'low risk', Italy welcomes milestone - New Straits Times
articles.description: ROME: All of Italy became a mask-free, "low-risk" zone for coronavirus Monday, marking a dramatic milestone for the first European country to be hit by the global pandemic in February 2020.

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Soccer-Belgium coach hails team's strong mentality after Portugal win - The Star Online
articles.description: SEVILLE (Reuters) -     Belgium coach Roberto Martinez hailed his team’s strong mentality after they ended Portugal’s reign at the European Championship with a 1-0 win in a bruising last-16 encounter in Seville on Sunday.
